== Doddahalli (610523) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Doddahalli is a village in the [[Pavagada ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 501.97 hectares and harbouring 295 households with total population of 1463 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Pavagada]] is at a distance of 22 km. Male population is 725 and female population is 738. Scheduled Caste Population is 502 and Scheduled Tribes population is 381. Census Location Code of the village is 610523<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 896 (61.24%)
* Literate male population: 496 (68.41%)
* Literate female population: 400 (54.2%)
